74.1 F 1 score.from sentence: In Remarkably , we get 74.1 F 1 score on the out - of - domain dataset , which outperforms the previous state - of - the - art system by 2.0 F 1 score .

FFN nonlinear sub - layers.from sentence: When ensembling 5 models with FFN nonlinear sub - layers , our approach achieves an F 1 score of 84.6 and 83.9 on the two datasets respectively , which has an absolute improvement of 1.4 and 0.5 over the previous state - of - the - art .

results.from sentence: These results are consistent with our intuition that the self - attention layers is helpful to capture structural information and long distance dependencies .
